sentences.english: The southern portion of the country is taken up by the Gobi Desert, while the northern and western portions are mountainous.
sentences.chinese: 該國南部是戈壁大沙漠，北部和西部都是高山。

sentences.english: Ride the rails along deep river canyons and over high mountain passes.
sentences.chinese: 沿着深河峽谷和高山通行的路軌。

sentences.english: Many would like to board the mountains, Wang Jin End of the World Acacia color.
sentences.chinese: 多想登上高山，望盡天涯相思的顏色。

sentences.english: For the viewer to fall, to swim natural pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 給觀賞者以高山流水，歸遊自然的欣悅。

sentences.english: So I named this song as High mountains and Running water.
sentences.chinese: 於是我把這曲稱爲《高山流水》。

sentences.english: The sea in the sails, call your motivate you struggled to climb the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 大海在召喚你揚帆遠航，高山在激勵你奮力攀登。

sentences.english: Here, the high mountainous terrain is covered with forests.
There are no foot hills, no mountains, no plateaus, in any direction.
sentences.chinese: 莫斯科的任何方向上都沒有山腳，高山和高原。

sentences.english: At a time when mountain too proud, uncle Mao Qingyuan the late news.
sentences.chinese: 就在高山春風得意之時，大伯毛清源過世的消息傳來。

sentences.english: Visit Mount Washington Alpine Resort for details.
sentences.chinese: 爲細節訪問山華盛頓高山的勝地。

sentences.english: Here is the even shop summit in on a mountain beautiful picture scroll.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是平鋪在高山之巔上的一幅美麗的畫卷。

sentences.english: Florogeography of vascular plants in alpine tundra of the Changbai Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 長白山高山凍原維管植物區系地理。

sentences.english: Don't risk climbing such a high mountain on so snowy a day.
sentences.chinese: 不要冒險在這麼樣的大雪天登這樣一座高山。

sentences.english: It's at this time of year that I start to pine for the snow-topped mountains.
sentences.chinese: 每年這個時候我就開始嚮往覆蓋着白雪的高山。

sentences.english: Lofty figs are tall evergreen trees, reaching 35 metres in height.
sentences.chinese: 高山榕樹爲高大常綠喬木，可高達35米。

sentences.english: No mountain in the world is so high but they can reach the top.
sentences.chinese: 世界上沒有任何高山他們不能達到其峯巔的。
